name: Demo plugin rejects posts in the demo channel

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
1. Install and enable the demo plugin
2. Join the demo plugin test channel
3. Make a post i the demo channel
inline.expectedResult: Post in not made in the channel and Demo plugin user makes a post informing the user that posting in the demo plugin channel is not permitted

inline.description:
1. Open any channel other than the demo plugin channel
2. Post an @ mention for the demo plugin user
inline.expectedResult: Post in not made in the channel and user gets a system message "You must not talk about the demo plugin user"
